txt.en: Nestled in the foothills of the Misty Mountains, the dwarf-keep of Kidzul-kâlah lies half-sunken in the Gladdenmere. With the eyes of the dwarves elsewhere, the Dourhands have come to steal priceless relics long ago left behind....\n\nYour mission is to recover dwarf-caches from Kidzul-kâlah before the Dourhands can lay claim to them.
You have been tasked with recovering dwarf-caches from Kidzul-kâlah before the Dourhands can lay claim to them.
You have completed your mission.\n\nYou should talk to Ausma for your reward.

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'My scouts have sent urgent word from Kidzul-kâlah. While our eyes have been turned toward Gundabad, it seems the Dourhands have taken to pillaging in the wake of the Gabil'akkâ. From what I am told, they seek to claim what few relics remain in its halls.

'You are to travel to Kidzul-kâlah and stop the Dourhands from stealing its relics. Instead, claim them on behalf of the Gabil'akkâ, and I shall see that they are looked after by more honourable dwarves!'
Monsters in this mission will enrage at low morale, gaining attack strength and attack speed.
Your mission is to recover dwarf-caches from Kidzul-kâlah before the Dourhands can lay claim to them.\n\nYou should talk to Ausma and travel to Kidzul-kâlah.
'Thank you, [placeholder]! I shall see that these relics are kept well-guarded.\n\n'Like many of the Longbeards, I thought we had seen the last of the Dourhands. Alas, it was not to be!'
